code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import ImgCart from"../../assets/img/Cart.png";import{signOut}from"../../reducks/user/operations";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{push}from"connected-react-router";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const key=localStorage.getItem("LOGIN_USER_KEY");const[checkUser,setCheckUser]=useState(false);const signOutButton=()=>{dispatch(signOut());setCheckUser(false);dispatch(push("/signin"));};useEffect(()=>{if(key!=null){setCheckUser(true);}},[key]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{class:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"submarine",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",class:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Dino's Pizzeria"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"cart",children:[key?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{class:"sign-in",onClick:signOutButton,children:"Logout"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/signin",children:"Sign In"}),checkUser&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/cart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:ImgCart})})]})]})});}export default Header;
